course_description: This course is a beginning level technique class and is designed to introduce students to modern dance terminology, technique, and performance. This course will concentrate on body alignment, technical development, performance quality, improvisation, and proper execution of modern exercises and combinations.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 4147, Section #: 1, Type: PE, Campus: OXF, Meets: TTh 1-2:15p, Instructor: C. Ellisor, Status: Closed
